name: Press SPACE (Benjamin Emdon)
description:
Submission for Winter Jam by SoloDevelopment 2022

Theme: The End is Near

Made in 72 Hours

The end really is near! Literally. It's a black hole, and it just ate your entire planet. Only you managed to escape in time, in your trusty, rusty spaceship - but not even light can escape the gravity of a black hole...

Your demise is inevitable - but hey, at least you can say that you survived longer than anyone else! Right? 

Let's see if you can put up a good fight, before the end...

Development Team

Benjamin Emdon - Programming

Matthew Stevenson - Programming

Abraham Emdon - Art and Animation 

Evelyn Hawkins - Art and Audio

Download Instructions

Download and extract the .zip file.

Inside the folder, open the PressSPACE.exe file to play.

Enjoy!
